arts.ttl: Aston Villa v Fulham: Premier League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Premier League updates from 2pm BST ⚽️ Sign up for Football Daily | And email Daniel As for Fulham, they make two changes: Timothy Castagne replaces Kenny Tete at right-back while, up front, Raúl Jiménez is in for Rodrigo Muniz. So looking at his team in more detail, Emi Martínez, injured in midweek, is back in net while, at the back, Emery reverts to the back four which started against Sunderland, so Ian Maatsen and Pau Torres drop out, with Tyrone Mings and Lucas Digne returning. Then, in midfield, Lamare Bogarde comes in for Boubacar Kamara, not in the squad so presumably injured, and Harvey Elliott making his first Villa start in place of Emi Buendía. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Elliott starts for Aston Villa against former club Fulham LIVE!
arts.sum: “We need to get at them and show that we can beat them, because I’m 100 per cent sure that if we play our best we can get those three points. Joachim Andersen is wary of an Aston Villa backlash for Fulham on Sunday when the two sides meet in the Premier League at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Fulham – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be desperate to secure their first Premier League win of the season on Sunday when they host an in-form Fulham at Villa Park. Unai Emery’s side are winless in their opening five games and sit in the relegation zone. They do, however, boast a remarkable historical record against the Cottagers, having won […] The post Aston Villa vs Fulham – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
